member.name: SCHANNEL_CERT_HASH_STORE
member.summary: Contains the hash store data for the certificate that Schannel uses in kernel-mode.

member.name: SCHANNEL_CERT_HASH_STORE.dwLength
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of this structure.

summary.para: Contains bit flags that control the behavior of Schannel. This member can be zero or the following value.

listheader.description: The certificate hash of the computer.

member.name: SCHANNEL_CERT_HASH_STORE.pwszStoreName
member.summary: Pointer to the size of the store name.
